roleset.name: emit purring noise
roleset.note: PURR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'purr' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 37.3"manner of speaker", Framenet entries Motion Noise, Communication Noise, and Perception Noise. (from purr.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ewwwww
example.text: John's bed purrs like a kitten -- if you put a quarter in the slot first.
example.arg: if you put a quarter in the slot first

roleset.name: speak in a purring fashion
roleset.note: PURR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'purr' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 37.3"manner of speaker", Framenet entries Motion Noise, Communication Noise, and Perception Noise. (from purr.02-v predicate notes)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: `` [It 's like an oasis in this room]-1 , '' Ms. Foster purrs *trace*-1 .
